hero.title: About Reiseklar
hero.subtitle: Empowering smarter, greener commutes across Norway

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description1: Reiseklar was born from a simple idea: commuting in Norway should be easier, faster, and more environmentally friendly. We combine real-time transit data, intelligent routing algorithms, and user-friendly design to help you make the most of your journey.
mission.description2: Whether you're taking the bus, train, tram, or ferry, our platform provides personalized route recommendations that save you time while reducing your carbon footprint. Join thousands of Norwegians who are already making their daily commute smarter.

features.title: What We Offer
features.subtitle: Everything you need for a seamless commute experience

smartRouting.title: Smart Route Planning
smartRouting.description: Our AI-powered algorithms analyze multiple factors to find the optimal route for your journey, considering time, cost, and environmental impact.

realTime.title: Real-Time Updates
realTime.description: Stay informed with live transit updates, delays, and alternative routes. Never miss your connection again.

ecoFriendly.title: Eco-Friendly Choices
ecoFriendly.description: Track your environmental impact and discover greener alternatives. Every journey counts towards a sustainable future.

multiModal.title: Multi-Modal Transport
multiModal.description: Seamlessly combine buses, trains, trams, ferries, and walking to create the perfect journey for your needs.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: We continuously improve our platform with cutting-edge technology to deliver the best commute experience.

community.title: Community First
community.description: Your feedback shapes our product. We build features that truly matter to Norwegian commuters.

sustainability.title: Sustainability
sustainability.description: We're committed to reducing carbon emissions by making public transport more accessible and appealing.

cta.title: Ready to Transform Your Commute?
cta.description: Join our community and start planning smarter routes today

mapAndDepartures.title: Map and Departures
mapAndDepartures.description: View departures from stops, or find scooters and city bikes on the map.

trainsInEurope.title: Trains in Europe
trainsInEurope.description: Get information about Interrail, train services in Europe and delays.

aboutEntur.title: About Entur
aboutEntur.description: Read about Entur, what we do and our journey planner.

notFound.heading: Page Not Found
notFound.description: Sorry, we couldn't find the page you're looking for.

filters.title: How do you prefer to travel?

user.welcomeMessage: Here's your commute overview for today
user.planNewRouteDesc: Find the best route for your journey

deleteProfile.title: Do you want to delete the profile?
deleteProfile.description: Content that will be deleted includes tickets, payment cards, receipts and favorites. In cases where your profile is linked to an ongoing case, we will store certain information about you in addition to this.

settingsPage.title: Settings
settingsPage.description: Customize your preferences and account settings
settingsPage.emailNotificationsDesc: Receive trip updates and alerts via email
settingsPage.pushNotificationsDesc: Get real-time notifications on your device
settingsPage.twoFactorAuthDesc: Add an extra layer of security to your account

admin.manageUsersDesc: Add, edit, or remove user accounts

usersPage.title: User Management
usersPage.description: Manage all users and their permissions

analyticsPage.title: Analytics
analyticsPage.description: View detailed platform analytics and insights

settingsPage.title: System Settings
settingsPage.maintenanceModeDesc: Put the site into maintenance mode
settingsPage.requireEmailVerificationDesc: Users must verify their email to access the platform
